amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike section 3156 from the bill which deals with intellectual property related to uranium enrichment.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 55 printed in House Report 112-485 to strike section 3156 from the bill.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Pearce amendment (A038) Failed by recorded vote: 121 - 300 (Roll no. 287).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Pearce amendment (A038) Failed by recorded vote: 121 - 300 (Roll no. 287).
